Technologies

I have over 7 years experience in full-stack, database and Business Intelligence (BI) development. Over that time, I worked with many frameworks and languages, all of which are detailed below!

Business Intelligence (BI)

In my current job in Dawn Meats, I have gotten vast experience in Business Intelligence tools primarily extracting SQL-based data sources and creating rich charts, visualisations and reports in a range of tools such as:

QlikView
QlikSense
NPrinting
Microsoft SSRS
Emydex

Databases

I gained experience with both relational and non-relational databases as well as using a range of ORMs to manage application data.

MSSQL Server
MySQL
PostgreSQL
MongoDB
GraphQL
Sequelize
Mongoose

Front-End Frameworks

I worked with various front-end frameworks during my time at TSSG as well as learning new ones in my spare time. Below is a list of the frameworks I've used.

Semantic UI
Bootstrap
Angular Material
UIKit
Bulma
Grommet

JavaScript

Most of my full-stack experience is in JavaScript programming. Below are the frameworks I've worked on since I started in the industry.

Angular 1.x
Angular 2+
React
Vue.js
Node.js
Express.js
Svelte

Python

I have commercial experience with Python through developing a SDN web application.

Django
Beautiful Soup
